p: Last but not least, from the alkaloids reported in N. glauca, and to the best of our knowledge, only for nicotine an acute contact LD 50 > 500 μg/g bee body weight (bw), is established, which classifies nicotine as a moderate toxicant for bees [ 25]. Therefore, any additional data that associate alkaloids consumption to honeybees effects is of high significance, and to an extent is provided in the herein presented work.
